          <title>
            <string language="en">Analogue signals</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Analogsignale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Signaux analogues</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sinais análogos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Segnali di analogico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αναλογικά σήματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Señales analogicas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the graph of analogue signals obtained from the sounds from a microphone and from a loudspeaker.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">amplitude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">analogue signals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electrical signals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">loudspeakers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="en">sound</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Time</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt das Diagramm der 
Analogsignale, die von den Tönen von einem Mikrophon und von einem 
Lautsprecher erhalten werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre le graphique des 
signaux analogues obtenus à partir des bruits d'un microphone et d'un
haut-parleur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o gráfico dos sinais 
análogos obtidos dos sons de um microfone e de um loudspeaker.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il grafico dei 
segnali di analogico ottenuti dai suoni da un microfono e da un 
altoparlante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τη γραφική παράσταση των 
αναλογικών σημάτων που λαμβάνονται από τους ήχους από ένα 
μικρόφωνο και από ένα μεγάφωνο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el gráfico de las 
señales analogicas obtenidas de los sonidos de un micrófono y de un 
altavoz.</string>
          </description>
